record.title: EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - September 17, 2008)

[Page: S8910]

speaking.paragraph: On behalf of the majority leader, I ask unanimous consent that the period for morning business be extended to 2:15 p.m. today, with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
